[Wand of Hopeless Night](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3425)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Darkness" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=569" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=731" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 309 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand is a length of wrought black iron.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1480). Each creature that ends its turn within the spell's area must succeed at a DC 20 Will save or become [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) 1 (frightened 2 on a critical failure).

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1480) of the appropriate rank.
